description: Detects changes to the registry for the currently logged-in user. In order to disable PowerShell module logging, script block logging or transcription and script execution logging
author: frack113
name: PowerShell Logging Disabled Via Registry Key Tampering
query: (winlog.event_data.EventType:"SetValue" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(*\\Microsoft\\Windows\\PowerShell\\* OR *\\Microsoft\\PowerShellCore\\*) AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(*\\ModuleLogging\\EnableModuleLogging OR *\\ScriptBlockLogging\\EnableScriptBlockLogging OR *\\ScriptBlockLogging\\EnableScriptBlockInvocationLogging OR *\\Transcription\\EnableTranscripting OR *\\Transcription\\EnableInvocationHeader OR *\\EnableScripts) AND winlog.event_data.Details:"DWORD (0x00000000)")
